description:
Driven out from his orphanage, Nakajima Atsushi wanders the streets of Yokohama on the bring of starvation. Determined to live, a chance encounter with a drowning stranger changes his fate...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Wege des Tigers sind unergründlich
La sorte è imprevedibile e mutevole
Les voies du Tigre sont impénétrables
